notes.note: Renamed project from flxjs to jsi.
Added AJAX package
Implemented ajax.getXMLResponse()
Implemented AjaxElement class and AjaxAutomate to handle automatic ajax methodologies.
Fixed loadObject call to allow even Formitems to begin as Elements. THIS MEANS WE COULD DEVELOP A PROPER LOAD() FACTORY CALL
Fixed a few naming inconsistencies in the animation subpackage.
Began work on new package: table. Started with basic table, row, column, cell functionality. Aim to implement sort and paging soon.
Table package now allows Cells to be Elements. Also used Renderer class to draw, and refresh the table.
Implemented numeric and text sorting for columns, including cells of element types.
Started paging.
Fixed issue within validation package that didn't recognise 0 as a min or max numeric value.
Updated table.loadFromXML().
Added table.AutomatedTable object for quick loading objects.
Updates to the table and dhtml packages. Many new dhtml functions.
dhtml.getAttributes() only returns attributes that are not null.
Allowed the creation of columns, cells and rows without the owner object. The owner is now assigned when add[type] is called.
Minor changes to DHTML and TABLE, including dhtml.cloneNode function and table.row.getCells
Created INPUT object as an extension of table.
Removed the Preloading via XML option in INPUT table and made it now have to occur using the insertRow() function.
Fixed fade to prevent early calls to start() from executing the first opacity change - (added hasDelay() to base animation class).
Removed unnecessary directories in solution.
Fixed bug where no result in ajax automation threw error.
Extended Ajax to now allow a caller output function for every row of output.
Added select option to Dhtml package.
Added addOption() removeOption() anbd clearOptions() to DHTML.Select
ENFORCED createElement() in loader to always call dhtml.resetElementType().
Major overhaul from previous version. Switched whole project into using prototype to improve performance. Namespaced everything properly. Removed private variables.
Animation is now it's own package.
There is a new package: Testing.
resetElementType() is no longer supported. Use var element = jsi.dhtml.resetElement(element);
all library functions now require jsi.library namespace.
Factory function for dhtml object.
No more support for creators: loadElement(), loadForm() etc. has been removed. Must use "new jsi.dhtml.Element(id)" to load a new element for example.
